attributes.title: Score Field
attributes.readMe:
A visual score field designed for displaying numeric scores like credit scores, test scores, or ratings within a defined range.

**Features:**
- Segmented progress bar with color-coded tiers
- Dynamic coloring based on score thresholds
- Percentile ranking display
- Custom label support
- Configurable min/max range

**Color Tiers:**
- 0-25%: Red (Poor) - destructive
- 25-50%: Orange (Fair) - warning
- 50-75%: Yellow (Good) - caution
- 75-100%: Green (Excellent) - success

**Embedded View:**
- Large score display with color coding
- Segmented bar showing position in range
- Percentile ranking (e.g., "Top 23% of range")
- Optional custom label

**Atom View:**
- Mini chart icon with dynamic color
- Compact score display
